select pp.delivery as delivery, pp.plant as plant, pp.ship_to_party as shipToParty, pp.name_of_ship_to_party as nameOfShipToParty, pp.delivery_date as deliveryDate, pp.item as item, pp.material as material, STR_TO_DATE(pp.expire_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as batch, # STR_TO_DATE(pp.batch, '%Y-%m-%d') as production_batch, pp.production_batch as production_batch, pp.sales_unit as salesUnit, sum(delivery_quantity) as deliveryQuantity from product_pick pp where pp.delete_flag = 0 and pp.sudn_id = #{sudnId} and pp.status = #{status}
AND pp.delivery like concat('%', #{delivery}, '%')
AND pp.sscc like concat('%', #{sscc}, '%')
AND pp.material like concat('%', #{material}, '%')
AND pp.batch like concat('%', #{batch}, '%')
AND pp.production_batch like concat('%', #{productionBatch}, '%')
AND pp.shipper like concat('%', #{shipper}, '%')
and pp.create_time >= #{startCreateTime} and pp.create_time <= #{endCreateTime} group by pp.delivery, pp.plant, pp.ship_to_party, pp.name_of_ship_to_party, pp.delivery_date, pp.item, pp.material, pp.expire_date, pp.production_batch, pp.sales_unit,pp.batch
